convertRules:
# Converting Rules
# ---------------------------------------------

# line head converting. 
# Note: this rule can't apply to the very first line of the document
'\n》|' -> '\n>|'
'\n、|' -> '\n/|'

# CN symbols to EN
'。。|' -> '.|'
'》》|' -> '>|'
'、、|' -> '/|'
'；；|' -> ';|'
'，，|' -> ',|'

# auto pair and convert
'《《|》' -> '<|' # this one take higer priority than the next line
'《|'     -> '《|》'
'（（|）' -> '(|)'
'（|'     -> '（|）'

# auto code block
'··|'  -> '`|`' # inline block
'`·|`' -> '```|\n```'

# have fun converting!
# 'dpx|' -> 'don\'t panic|'
'pyb|' -> '```python\n\n```|'

# Selection Insert Rules
# ---------------------------------------------
'·'  -> '`' + '`'
'￥'  -> '$' + '$'
'《'  -> '《' + '》'
'<'  -> '<' + '>'
